about_the_game:
House Builder - Plumbing DLC:

🚰 Step into the role of a plumber and design efficient water and sewage systems! Lay pipes, install fixtures, and tackle repairs in fun, realistic challenges. Balance creativity and precision to deliver leak-free solutions and leave clients satisfied. 💧 Build, fix, perfect!

Key Features:

🚰 Plumbing - every home depends on it, yet it's a mystery for most... but not for you! Step into the world of plumbing in a calm, engaging, and risk-free way. The new expansion pack introduces plumbing challenges that blend realism with casual gaming fun.

🔧 May the water flow freely!Take on the role of a plumber and handle the construction of water and sewage systems from start to finish. Learn the art of laying pipes, installing fixtures, and assembling the various elements of a fully functional plumbing system. Use your knowledge and creativity to design solutions that are not only efficient and durable but also practical and user-friendly. The secret to success lies in precision and ingenuity!

💡 Design with flair.You have access to a wide array of plumbing tools and components to bring your designs to life. Plan pipe routes, install faucets and toilets, and ensure that everything flows smoothly—both literally and figuratively! Solve each challenge your way, and make sure your installations are leak-free and efficient.

🚿 Tackle diverse projects.As a professional plumber, you'll face a variety of challenges. From creating brand-new plumbing systems to diagnosing leaks and fixing questionable DIY attempts, every task requires skill and smart budgeting. Balance your client's needs with their wallet to deliver a job well done without breaking the bank.

🧽 Clean up like a pro.A polished finish is just as important as the pipes themselves! Once the plumbing system is complete, tidy up the workspace, seal the pipes within the walls, smooth over surfaces, and repaint the area to perfection. Leave no trace behind except satisfied clients!

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian, Croatian, Estonian, Hindi, Lithuanian, Mongolian, Slovak, Indonesian
*languages with full audio support
